A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Remember when you were a  kid and you were excited to get a Luke Skywalker action figure for Christmas and instead you got a cheap overseas knock off \"Duke Spacewalker Lazer Sword Action Man\"?   Remember that punch in the guts feeling as you mumbled a thank you to your parents?  Well bucko\, that's how you're going to feel walking out of the theatre after watching The Last Jedi.
